text: Aleksei Alekseyevich Volkov Aleksei Alekseyevich Volkov (; ; 1890–1942) was a Russian Soviet statesman and first secretary of the Byelorussian SSR during the Soviet Union. Category:1890 births Category:1942 deaths Category:People from Kasimovsky District Category:People from Ryazan Governorate Category:Communist Party of Byelorussia politicians Category:Presidium of the Supreme Soviet Category:First convocation members of the Soviet of the Union category:People of the Russian Civil War
title: Aleksei Volkov (politician)
